text: The following is a list of episodes from the animated television series Beetlejuice. The first season consisted of 13 episodes. The second and third seasons each consisted of 8 episodes. The fourth and final season consisted of 65 episodes. The series premiered on September 9, 1989 and ended on December 6, 1991. Shout! Factory released the entire series on May 28, 2013. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (1989)=== ===Season 2 (1990)=== The second and third seasons each contained eight episodes, which makes shortest seasons to air. ===Season 3 (1991)=== ===Season 4 (1991)=== The fourth and final season contained sixty-five episodes, which makes it the longest season to air. Note: Lydia is absent in three episodes "You're History", "Sore Feet" and "The Miss Beauty Juice Pageant" ==External links== * * * Beetlejuice episodes, List of
title: List of Beetlejuice episodes
